meaning_str.bing:
n. 和谐；协调；调和；谐波
网络. 和声；和睦；融洽

和谐；协调；一致；统一；和睦；融洽；调和；配合；和声；和弦

1.en: when trying to heighten team harmony, increase morale, improve communication or repair broken trust in an organization.
1.cn: 在试图增加一个组织中的团队和谐、提振士气、加强沟通或修复受损的信任时，这种方法尤其有价值。

2.en: gains and losses do not care about old scores, modest restraint is a virtue, contentment is often music, harmony on the well-being.
2.cn: 得失恩怨不计较，谦让克制是美德，知足则常乐，和谐就幸福。

3.en: We seek to help YOU find a route out of illusion so YOU may once more be in harmony with ALL that is around YOU.
3.cn: 我们力求来帮助您找到一条远离幻象的路，以便你们可以再一次与周围的所有保持和谐。

0.en: He called the English the disturbers of our harmony.
0.cn: 他称英国人为"破坏我们和谐的人"。

1.en: Peace and harmony in all the world, Peace and harmony in all the world, Peace and harmony in all the world, Peace and harmony. Great. What a wonderful display of togetherness.
1.cn: 全世界都和平和谐，全世界都和平和谐，全世界都和平和谐，和平，和谐。唱得好。这真是一次精彩至极的集体大合唱啊。

2.en: Does everyone remember the words? Yes, Madame Gazelle. Peace and harmony in all the world, Peace and harmony in all the world, Peace and harmony in all the world, Peace and harmony.
2.cn: 大家还记得这首歌怎么唱吗？记得，羚羊夫人。全世界都和平和谐，全世界都和平和谐，全世界都和平和谐，和平，和谐。

3.en: Peppa and her friends love singing together in harmony. All the countries of the world love singing together in harmony.
3.cn: 佩奇和朋友们喜欢在一起和谐的歌唱。全世界的国家都喜欢在一起和谐的歌唱。

4.en: Now predator and prey live in harmony. And every young mammal has multitudinous opportunities.
4.cn: 现在食肉和食草动物和谐共处，每只哺乳动物的未来都有了无限可能。

5.en: All of these are... Me. I have what the Avengers never will, harmony. They're discoordinate, disconnected.
5.cn: 这些都是... 我，我拥有复仇者永远无法企及的东西，和谐，他们龃龉不合，毫无秩序。

6.en: Madame Gazelle, what do all the countries of the world do? They sing the song of harmony together. Hooray. I like singing. So do I.
6.cn: 羚羊夫人，所有国家都会在国际日做什么？他们在这天会聚在一起唱和谐之歌。好耶！我最喜欢唱歌了。我也喜欢。

7.en: Oh, dear, the countries of the world are not playing nicely together. Peace and harmony in all the... What's that noise? Oh, no. The countries are fighting.
7.cn: 噢，糟糕，这些国家在一起玩耍可不怎么友好。全世界是和谐一家人——外面怎么这么吵啊？噢，不！这些国家吵起来了。

8.en: Hello. All the parents have arrived. How is International Day going? Not too bad. Excellent. Lovely. We will now sing for you the song of harmony.
8.cn: 你们好啊。所有家长都来了。今天国际日过得怎么样？还不算是太糟吧。那太好了。这样就好了。现在我们要为你们唱一首和谐之歌。

9.en: Amity farm the land. They're all about kindness and harmony, always happy.
9.cn: 友好派负责耕种，他们善良而又和睦，永远充满快乐。

10.en: The power of Chinese people in China are gradually proving that we can make a better world as we love peace and harmony.
10.cn: 在神州大地上的炎黄子孙们正在逐渐证明，我们能共建美好的家园，毕竟中华儿女自古以来以和为贵。

11.en: Naive little hick with good grades and big ideas decides "Hey, look at me, I'm gonna move to Zootopia, where predators and prey live in harmony and sing Kumbaya!"
11.cn: 天真的小山妞成绩好有理想就觉得我得去动物城，食肉和食草动物和平相处，还一起唱山歌。
